publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2562 Patrick Harvie:Scottish Standard—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Scottish Standard; congratulates the publisher and staff on their first edition; values the role of the indigenous Scottish press, and welcomes any increase in the diversity of news providers in Scotland.
S2M-2562 Scottish Standard (lodged on 9 March 2005) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-2562 Patrick Harvie:Scottish Standard—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Scottish Standard; congratulates the publisher and staff on their first edition; values the role of the indigenous Scottish press, and welcomes any increase in the diversity of news providers in Scotland. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Michael Matheson
S2M-2562 Scottish Standard (lodged on 9 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2562 Scottish Standard (lodged on 9 March 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2562 Scottish Standard (lodged on 9 March 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2562 Scottish Standard (lodged on 9 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
